# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the tooltip interaction is in the enabled state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

A view or control can only display a tooltip from an enabled interaction. Set the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolTipInteraction/isEnabled] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to enable the interaction or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to disable it. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Managing the interaction

- **defaultToolTip**: The text that appears in a tooltip by default.
